page.title: 19TOYS AND GAMES IN SANDIWAY
page.content: After doing a small survey the {favourite}toys in this school seem to be{star wars figures, dolls, and teddy {bears.}Here is a small account of each one, first star wars figures. Star wars figures are plastic figures about 9cm high. They are characters out of films, either{Star Wars, Empire {Strikes Back, or Return of the Jedi. } You can also get weird creatures and space vehicles. They have movable arms and legs and can be put into lots of different positions.{Dolls}are usually plastic with nylon fibre hair, some wet their nappies! some can talk and some you can dress up.{Teddy bears}are made out of{wool}and other things made to look like wool, they have plastic noses and eyes and don't do much! I think that in{100}years time toys and games will be very different, they may even have{minds! }
